# SCNChamferMode.front

**Case**

Apply a chamfer to only the front edge of the extruded shape.

## Declaration

```swift
case front
```

## Constants

- **SCNChamferMode.both**: Apply a chamfer to both front and back edges of the extruded shape.
- **SCNChamferMode.back**: Apply a chamfer to only the back edge of the extruded shape.

items.description: Apply a chamfer to both front and back edges of the extruded shape.
items.name: SCNChamferMode.both

items.description: Apply a chamfer to only the back edge of the extruded shape.
items.name: SCNChamferMode.back
